ygData.subject: Re: Offtopic: Asheron's Call vs. Everquest
ygData.msgSnippet: Actuually, Cendant owns Sierra, which owns Blizzard, which makes Diablo 2 :) -Alex ... From: Sean Gifford  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Actuually, Cendant owns Sierra, which owns Blizzard, which makes Diablo 2 :)

-Alex

----- Original Message -----
From: Sean Gifford <giffords@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, July 16, 1999 4:28 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Offtopic: Asheron's Call vs. Everquest


> From: "Sean Gifford" <giffords@...>
>
> Yes, I worked on a Diablo 2 website for quite a while, and have followed
the
> game alot. Diablo 2 will definetly have excellent content. (although the
> people that make StarCraft, and the people that make Diablo are completely
> different development teams) It will be a purely hack and slash nature of
> game. And I have never heard of Cendant, they have nothing to do with the
> production of Diablo 2 from what I have heard. This is really really
> offtopic ).
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Naeeldar <jackal@...>
> To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Date: Friday, July 16, 1999 3:33 PM
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Offtopic: Asheron's Call vs. Everquest
>
>
> >From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
> >
> >Actually this is Blizzard and believe me content is what they are about
> look
> >at the last game they made Starcraft great game played it for 20days of
> >playing time.
> >
> >Conaldar
> >Naeeldar
> >
> >-----Original Message-----
> >From: Sharon Mock <sharon@...>
> >To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
> >Date: Friday, July 16, 1999 1:57 PM
> >Subject: Re: [eqbards] Offtopic: Asheron's Call vs. Everquest
> >
> >
> >>From: "Sharon Mock" <sharon@...>
> >>
> >>Yes, and I know for a fact that Diablo 2 will be horrible, because it's
> >>published by Cendant, and they have so little soul that they cook their
> >>books.
> >>
> >>Blizzard, you say? Who cares who DEVELOPS the game? What matters is
who
> >>PUBLISHES it, because everybody knows it's the publisher who's
responsible
> >>for the content.
> >>
> >>Ahem... anyway...
> >>
> >>I like Asheron's Call in many ways, but I haven't played it for quite a
> >>while. IMO Turbine's designed the more interesting world, but Verant's
> >>designed the more playable game.
> >>
> >>Oh, and (straying back onto topic, vaguely) Asheron's Call won't have
> >bards,
> >>at least not for initial release, which probably means not ever.
> >>
> >> -- Sharon
> >>
> >>----------
> >>>From: Llewrend Lynnhaven <lordartos@...>
> >>>To: eqbards@onelist.com
> >>>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Offtopic: Asheron's Call vs. Everquest
> >>>Date: Fri, Jul 16, 1999, 7:41 AM
> >>>
> >>
> >>>From: Llewrend Lynnhaven <lordartos@...>
> >>>
> >>>
> >>>Many of my friends were trying to tell me how good
> >>>Ashrons Call was going to be when it came out. But I
> >>>only had to see one name on the package to know this
> >>>would not be, for you see, my friends
> >>>
> >>>MICROSOFT HAS NO SOUL
> >>>
